/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their modern architecture showcasing a blend of glass and steel structures interspersed with concrete edifices. The sky above is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
